div.p: This Implementation Guide specifies profiles on the FHIR Device, DeviceMetric, and Observation resources. Each profile defines constraints, extensions, and terminology requirements for an implementation that claims conformance to this guide.

A point-of-care device model is made of multiple resource instances and the relationships between them. The following diagram shows the FHIR resource profiles (blue) and references to other profiles or FHIR core resources (white).
